product_description.product_name: ASHBY’S READY MIXED - 30MPA HS ECOPACT STRUCTURAL Mix
product_description.manufacturing_process: Ready-mix concrete is produced at batching plants where controlled operations allow precise mix designs resulting in a product that is delivered to construction sites in a freshly mixed, plastic, or unhardened state.
product_description.packaging: Delivered in bulk with no packaging

impact_categories_calculated: Use of renewable primary energy resources used as raw materials (PERM)
Use of non-renewable primary energy resources used as raw materials (PENRM)
lca_information.data_quality: Foreground data on raw material requirements, manufacture and distribution was provided as primary source by Holcim (NZ) for the year January 2022 - December 2022.

transport_and_installation.transport: Materials transported via truck; aggregates and cements by heavy trucks, other raw materials by medium trucks.

end_of_life.deconstruction: Assumed to use drilling to break and remove the concrete.
end_of_life.disposal: All products assumed to be landfilled, no recycling at end of life.

recycled_materials_handling.allocation: Co-products considered as co-products of their production process and impacts allocated according to PCR 2019:14.
